ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] EQ Windows Prog
ygData.msgSnippet: A note on this. If Verant does somehow find out, it *is* a violation of the terms of service to use it. The GMs said that this program specifically was against
ygData.messageBody:
A note on this. If Verant does somehow find out, it *is* a violation of the
terms of service to use it. The GMs said that this program specifically was
against the rules. Also, many of the programs like this may contain a virus
with a password sniffer to steal your info and get your account.
luv,
-Su

> Yes I use this proggy, its VERY cool. It doesnt disrupt or interfere with
the data stream so while not strictly cosha, its not detectable by Verant
and not really a hack proggy, despite being found at a hackers site.
>
> Download from http://eqw.eqhackers.com/
>
>
> -----Original Message-----
